description: This Dashboard is for SQL on VM's or On-premise SQL Server/containers

targets.query: SELECT last("server_memory") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "sku" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "hardware_type" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("db_online") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /SQL Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT sum("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /Resource Pool Stats/ AND  "counter" = 'CPU usage %') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'CPU usage %' AND "object" =~ /Workload Group Stats/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("wait_time_ms", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceType.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "wait_type"
SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object" =~ /Memory Manager/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object"  =~ /Buffer Manager/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "counter" =~ /sec/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object"  =~ /Access Methods/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "counter" =~ /sec/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /General Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

list.definition: select sql_instance from (select  "sql_instance", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" where  "engine_edition" = 3 and $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance)
list.label: InstanceName
list.name: InstanceName
list.query: select sql_instance from (select  "sql_instance", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" where  "engine_edition" = 3 and $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance)

title: SQL Server Dashboard
